landing.bio: I am a Computer Science undergrad with strong hold on data structures and algorithms in C and C++. I have also worked with Node.js for server side development and React-Redux framework for front-end Development. Always on lookout for opportunities to utilize my skills and achieve personal and professional growth while being resourceful,innovative and dynamic in my work that will lead to a learning experience.

experience.aboutWork: Developed Basic Banking System website. A web application used to tranfer virtual money between multiple users and also record the banking transactions/activities.

projects.title: SOUVENIR
projects.description: Full Stack social media web app in which user can share posts,like and edit them by logging in JWT authentication with OAuth 2.0 support
projects.techused: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, node.js, React.js, mongodb, Redux.js

projects.title: NOTE KEEPER
projects.description: Front-end web application to keep and store the daily notes

projects.title: SPOTIFY CLONE
projects.description: Front-end clone web application of Spotify. Fully designed front webpage.

skills.name: Data Structures and Algorithms in C++

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a CS graduate, I love to travel, trek, hike and see through the nature. I'm also passionate about soccer and cricket.
interests.paragraphTwo: While staying at home i love to read books, watch movies and play games, I love to do picture animation and I spend large amount of free time exploring technological advancements in the tech fields.

awards.awardDetail: Secured Rank under 3000 among 50000+ participants in Round 2 Techgig CODE GLADIATORS 2021.
